hero-split.name: Split Hero
hero-split.description: Text/CTA on left, image/video on right. 50/50 or 60/40 split.
hero-split.structure: Two-column hero with content left, visual right
hero-split.codeHint: display: flex; hero with text container (50-60%) and image/video container (40-50%). Text side: headline, subheadline, CTA buttons, optional stats row below. Visual side: product screenshot, mockup, or looping video.

hero-full-image.name: Full Image Hero
hero-full-image.description: Full-width background image with overlay and centered content
hero-full-image.structure: Full viewport hero with background image, gradient overlay, centered text
hero-full-image.codeHint: Full viewport section with backgroundImage using linear-gradient overlay. Content absolutely centered. Large headline, subheadline, CTA button(s). Optional scroll indicator at bottom.

hero-video-background.name: Video Background Hero
hero-video-background.description: Looping video background with overlay and content
hero-video-background.structure: Full viewport with autoplay muted video, gradient overlay, centered content
hero-video-background.codeHint: <video autoPlay muted loop playsInline> as background with position absolute, object-fit cover. Gradient overlay div. Content centered with high z-index. Fallback image for mobile.

hero-minimal.name: Minimal Hero
hero-minimal.description: Simple text-focused hero with minimal visuals
hero-minimal.structure: Clean hero with just headline, brief text, and single CTA
hero-minimal.codeHint: Simple centered container with large headline, optional subtext, single CTA. Background can be solid color or subtle gradient. Focus on typography.

hero-cards-overlay.name: Hero with Cards Overlay
hero-cards-overlay.description: Hero with floating service/feature cards overlapping into next section
hero-cards-overlay.structure: Hero with background, then row of cards that overlap hero bottom edge
hero-cards-overlay.codeHint: Hero section with negative margin cards container. Cards positioned to overlap hero bottom by 50%. Creates depth and visual interest. Cards contain icons, titles, brief descriptions.

hero-asymmetric.name: Asymmetric Hero
hero-asymmetric.description: Off-center layout with diagonal or asymmetric visual elements
hero-asymmetric.structure: Content offset to one side with asymmetric shapes or images
hero-asymmetric.codeHint: Grid or flex layout with content taking 40% on left, visual element using clip-path or diagonal edges on right. Creates dynamic, modern feel.

hero-slider.name: Hero Slider/Carousel
hero-slider.description: Multiple rotating slides with different messages/images
hero-slider.codeHint: Carousel component with useState for active slide. Auto-advance with setInterval. Each slide has background image and unique content. Navigation dots and/or arrows.

hero-product-showcase.name: Product Showcase Hero
hero-product-showcase.description: Hero focused on displaying products with pricing/features
hero-product-showcase.structure: Product image prominent with key details and purchase CTA
hero-product-showcase.codeHint: Large product image/mockup with floating info cards. Price badge, key features, add-to-cart or subscribe CTA. Can include 3D rotation effect on product.

services-grid.name: Services Grid Layout
services-grid.description: Grid of service cards with icons, titles, descriptions
services-grid.structure: 3 or 4 column grid of service offerings
services-grid.codeHint: CSS Grid with gap. Each card: icon (Lucide), title, description, optional link. Hover effects: lift, shadow increase, icon color change. Equal height cards.

features-alternating.name: Alternating Features
features-alternating.description: Features listed with image/text alternating sides
features-alternating.structure: Full-width sections alternating: text-left/image-right, then image-left/text-right
features-alternating.codeHint: Stack of full-width sections. Odd sections: flex-direction row (text left, image right). Even sections: flex-direction row-reverse. Each section: heading, paragraph, bullet points, image.

testimonials-carousel.name: Testimonials Carousel
testimonials-carousel.description: Rotating testimonial cards with customer quotes
testimonials-carousel.structure: Single testimonial displayed at a time with navigation
testimonials-carousel.codeHint: useState for active index. Large quote icon, testimonial text in italics, customer name, title, optional photo. Auto-advance or manual navigation. Fade transition between testimonials.

testimonials-grid.name: Testimonials Grid
testimonials-grid.description: Multiple testimonials displayed in a grid layout
testimonials-grid.codeHint: Grid of testimonial cards. Each card: quote text, author info, star rating optional. Cards can have subtle border or shadow. Masonry-style optional for varying heights.

pricing-cards.name: Pricing Cards
pricing-cards.description: 2-3 pricing tiers side by side with feature comparison
pricing-cards.structure: Row of pricing cards with features and CTAs
pricing-cards.codeHint: Flex or grid row of pricing cards. Featured/recommended tier highlighted with different background or border. Each card: tier name, price, billing period, feature list with check icons, CTA button. Featured card slightly larger or elevated.

stats-row.name: Statistics Row
stats-row.description: Row of impressive statistics with numbers and labels
stats-row.codeHint: Flex row with justify-content space-around. Each stat: large animated number (counter animation), label below. Numbers can have + or % suffix. Use Intersection Observer to trigger count animation when visible.

cta-split.name: Split CTA Section
cta-split.description: Call-to-action with compelling copy and action button
cta-split.structure: Two-column CTA: headline/text on one side, form or button on other
cta-split.codeHint: Full-width section with contrasting background (dark or accent color). Split layout: left has headline and supporting text, right has email capture form or prominent CTA button.

cta-centered.name: Centered CTA Section
cta-centered.structure: Full-width section with centered headline, text, and button
cta-centered.codeHint: Full-width section, often with dark or gradient background. Centered content: compelling headline, optional subtext, prominent CTA button. Keep concise and action-focused.

gallery-masonry.name: Masonry Gallery
gallery-masonry.description: Pinterest-style image gallery with varying heights
gallery-masonry.codeHint: CSS columns or masonry grid. Images with varying aspect ratios. Hover effect: slight zoom, overlay with title/category. Lightbox on click for full view.

gallery-grid.name: Standard Gallery Grid
gallery-grid.description: Even grid of images with uniform sizing
gallery-grid.codeHint: CSS Grid with equal-sized cells. Images with object-fit cover. Hover: overlay with zoom icon or title. Click opens lightbox with larger image and navigation.

team-grid.name: Team Grid
team-grid.description: Grid of team member cards with photos and info
team-grid.structure: Grid of team member cards with photos, names, titles
team-grid.codeHint: Grid of team cards. Each card: circular or square photo, name, title, optional bio snippet, social links. Hover: reveal additional info or social links. Consistent photo treatment.

process-steps.name: Process Steps
process-steps.description: Numbered steps showing a process or how-it-works
process-steps.structure: Horizontal or vertical sequence of numbered steps
process-steps.codeHint: Flex row (or column on mobile) of numbered step cards. Each step: large number or icon, title, description. Connecting lines or arrows between steps. Numbers in accent color circles.

stepStructure.title: Step name
stepStructure.connector: Line or arrow to next step

faq-accordion.name: FAQ Accordion
faq-accordion.description: Expandable FAQ items with questions and answers
faq-accordion.structure: Vertical list of expandable question/answer pairs
faq-accordion.codeHint: useState for openIndex. Map through FAQ items. Each item: clickable question row with Plus/Minus icon, answer panel that expands/collapses with height transition. Only one open at a time, or allow multiple.

itemStructure.question: Question text, clickable
itemStructure.icon: Plus when closed, Minus when open

contact-split.name: Split Contact Section
contact-split.description: Contact form on one side, info/map on other
contact-split.structure: Two-column layout: form left, contact info right
contact-split.codeHint: Split layout. Left: contact form (name, email, phone, message, submit). Right: contact info with icons (MapPin, Phone, Mail, Clock), business hours, optional embedded map. Form with validation and submit handling.

blog-grid.name: Blog Post Grid
blog-grid.description: Grid of blog post preview cards
blog-grid.structure: Grid of blog post cards with images and excerpts
blog-grid.codeHint: Grid of blog cards. Each card: featured image, category tag, title, excerpt, author/date, read more link. Hover: slight lift, image zoom. Consistent card heights.

logo-cloud.name: Logo Cloud / Social Proof
logo-cloud.structure: Horizontal row of grayscale logos, optional 'Trusted by' label
logo-cloud.codeHint: Full-width section with centered logos. Label above: 'Trusted by' or 'As seen in' or 'Our clients'. Logos in grayscale, colorize on hover optional. Can auto-scroll for many logos.

newsletter-simple.name: Simple Newsletter Signup
newsletter-simple.description: Email capture section for newsletter signups
newsletter-simple.structure: Compact section with headline and email input
newsletter-simple.codeHint: Section with background color/pattern. Centered content: catchy headline, brief value prop, email input with submit button inline. Success/error state handling.
